resources.string: Welcome to the Country Capitals Quiz

This quiz will test your knowledge of world countries capitals.

First enter your name and please check the box confirming that you agree to the terms and conditions of this app. Note that otherwise you will not be able to start the quiz.

The test will consist of 10 questions each of which has one single correct answer. Please select the option you think is correct and press the Submit button. 

Note that you cannot go back and change a submitted answer. The Back button on your phone shall be disabled throughout this app.

Finally, you give this app an explicit permission to access the e-mail clients installed on your phone, in case you choose to share your result with your friends.
Which of the following capitals are located in %1$s
Raul hereby certifies that %1$s has provided %2$d correct answers out of a total of %3$d possible at his countries capitals quiz. Let\'s congratulate %1$s.
Raul hereby certifies that %1$s has provided %2$d correct answers out of a total of %3$d possible at his countries capitals quiz. Let\'s encourage %1$s to do better next time.
